column1: Uchi////I have been here several times
column2: and they never disappoint. Although they pack out right away
column3: they can usually seat me at the bar or community table. By far the best sushi I have ever had (and I have tried sushi all over the country). I love their cool tastings
column4: and usually order 3-5 of them. The taste
column6: and presentation is amazing! They just opened in Denver
column7: so I hope to try that location next. They have valet parking in the back. Only negative is their website says they take reservations
column8: but I have never been able to make one (always get a message saying nothing available) and I have tried days & weeks ahead.
